title: Herbs, Homeopathy, and Aromatherapy | HOLISTIC HEALTH AND NUTRITION
cleaned_text: HERBS, HOMEOPATHY, AND AROMATHERAPY Herbs, homeopathy and aromatherapy are different tools used for physical and emotional healing. Herbalists use plants in different forms, homeopaths uses minute doses of plants and other substances to stimulate the immune system. Aromatherapy and essential oils are crucial in helping balance the body, mind and spirit. Homeopathic medicine uses substances derived from plants, minerals, or animals and every homeopathic treatment is customized to each person. Homeopathic remedies are usually formulated as ointments, gels, drops, creams, tablets and pellets you can place under the tongue. Health conditions such as sports injuries, bruises, skin irritations, gastrointestinal problems, hormonal imbalance, back pain, muscle cramps, as well as behavioral issues such as fears, phobias and addictions are often treated with homeopathic remedies. Homeopathy has been regulated by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA). since 1938 and is considered to be safe.
